params.faction: Any Faction - can spawn from any informed or uninformed faction slot
params.defense: Varies, but gets a one-time use Invincible defense barrier

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If this rolls, two other Ancient Gods are guaranteed to exist, but no more than three can exist. You steal a random role's abilities and attributes from the slot you rolled from, and it can be any faction, as long as there are not multiple Ancient Gods in an informes faction. In an informed faction, you will be seen as your stolen role; only in death and investigations will you be seen as an Ancient God. You may perform your individual kill and stolen ability in the same night. Your individual attack value is the value of your stolen role, but one tier higher. If you exist, the Town will know this on day one, and informed faction members can use all abilities on each other. Under no circumstance can your individual attack kill another Ancient God - but your stolen attack can. On death, your real and disguised role are both revealed. You can only spawn if an NK slot exists, even though you don't occupy it

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: NK goal but all Ancient Gods win together
